title: New HUD feedback
body: Since your talking about "main field of view" how about put the map in the middle? It's the most important thing in the HUD and not much people actually look at it on the side.

replies.body: I think Riot should actually implement options so put what they want where they want, like how you can drag and resize the shop, champion stats and 'Tab' menu, would be really cool.
This right here. I'd much rather be able to put the different aspects of the HUD where I want to. I know where I need it for it to be most effective, Riot doesn't.

in the old HUD i used alert-pings on minimap all the time with holding right mousebutton and drag to the right alertping. Now that's not possible anymore. I tried it with adjusting keybinds. But it,s not possible. using keybord and mouse for alertpings just sucks... RIOT can you fix that?
some guy told me its a dota ripoff lel
Actually more people glance to the sides, that's why most games have it there by default, the map being in the middle would be an intustion.

I'm not a UI/HUD expert but in my opinion having the "Tactical" information that supports your moment to moment - mainly combat - gameplay decisions front and center because that’s a player’s main field of view makes sense. That's the information you need the most during the high action tense moments.

While having the minimap and the  "strategical" information on the side and in TAB means its there but you can look at it when you actually have time to think and plan for strategical/big picture moves/decisions.
If you can't look at the map now, moving it won't help.
